data.persona: I am a customer who needs his clothes cleaned. I do not have much money to purchase things with. I must look respectable when I visit the king.
data.description:
You are in the Fish Market.
The port is filled with many different small shops that sell fishes caught throughout the day. It is incredibly loud and busy with many customers and fisherman walking around and haggling for a good price on the fishes. There are tons of boxes sitting on the floors everywhere filled with ice, fish, and the fishermen's belongings.
The fisherman and the maid are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to steal the weights from the fisherman, so I can trade them to the maid for clean clothes.
data.mid_motivation: I need clean clothes so that I love presentable to the king when I visit him tomorrow.
data.long_motivation: I want to make a great impression on the king, so that he'll remember who I am when he looks for more servants next month.
